mapper.update:
update LAB_RESULT
REPORT_ITEM_NAME = #{reportItemName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REPORT_ITEM_CODE = #{reportItemCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RESULT = #{result,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UNITS = #{units,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ABNORMAL_INDICATOR = #{abnormalIndicator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INSTRUMENT_ID = #{instrumentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RESULT_DATE_TIME = #{resultDateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
RECHECK = #{recheck,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RECHECKDATE = #{recheckdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
PRINT_CONTEXT = #{printContext,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where TEST_NO = #{testNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and ITEM_NO = #{itemNo,jdbcType=NUMERIC} and PRINT_ORDER = #{printOrder,jdbcType=NUMERIC}

update LAB_RESULT set REPORT_ITEM_NAME = #{reportItemName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REPORT_ITEM_CODE = #{reportItemCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESULT = #{result,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UNITS = #{units,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ABNORMAL_INDICATOR = #{abnormalIndicator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INSTRUMENT_ID = #{instrumentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESULT_DATE_TIME = #{resultDateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, RECHECK = #{recheck,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RECHECKDATE = #{recheckdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, PRINT_CONTEXT = #{printContext,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where TEST_NO = #{testNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and ITEM_NO = #{itemNo,jdbcType=NUMERIC} and PRINT_ORDER = #{printOrder,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
